'''Ashampoo Burning Studio''' is an [[optical disc authoring software|optical disc authoring program]] for [[Microsoft Windows]], developed by Ashampoo. It is one of the most-used alternatives to [[Nero (computer software)|Nero Burning ROM]] on Windows{{Fact|date=October 2008}}, but still not as popular as the latter.
+
'''Ashampoo Burning Studio''' is an [[optical disc authoring software|optical disc authoring program]] for [[Microsoft Windows]], developed by Ashampoo. It is one of the most-used alternatives to [[Nero Burning ROM]] on Windows{{Fact|date=October 2008}}, but still not as popular as the latter.
Its main advantages are that it is simple, lightweight, and very easy to use. <ref>[http://news.softpedia.com/news/CDRWIN-vs-Ashampoo-Burning-Studio-38925.shtml CDRWIN vs. Ashampoo Burning Studio - Burn or get burnt! - Softpedia<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> However, that is also one of its weaknesses: it does not contain many extras that power users might find useful.
Its main advantages are that it is simple, lightweight, and very easy to use. <ref>[http://news.softpedia.com/news/CDRWIN-vs-Ashampoo-Burning-Studio-38925.shtml CDRWIN vs. Ashampoo Burning Studio - Burn or get burnt! - Softpedia<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> However, that is also one of its weaknesses: it does not contain many extras that power users might find useful.
